system.description: The character has become an expert with a specific type of ranged weapon, able to line up shots with exceptional speed.
system.benefit: Once per Combat Encounter, character can make an Aim Action as a Free Action for the chosen weapon group. For this Talent, choose one weapon group character has Weapon Training in. Can take this talent multiple times, each time choosing a different group. Example Groups: Bolt, Flame, Las, Launcher, Melta, Plasma, Low Tech(Primitive), SP, or Heavy
system.notes: Choose one weapon group. Can be taken multiple times for different groups.

specialAbilities.name: Free Aim Action
specialAbilities.description: Once per combat encounter, you can make an Aim Action as a Free Action when using the chosen weapon group.
